name: Watch Out !
description:
Tha game made during the global game jam 2019 at hepia in geneva.

The theme is "What does home means to you" .

To us it was our country , which is separated in four languages (french, german, italian and romanche ), we focused on the french one.  The Switzerland part named "Romande". 

In our plateformer Roman, the hero a pocket-watch, go on a journey to each capital of the six french states (Genève, Valais, Vaud, Fribourg, Neuchâtel, Jura) to take a speciality of each state and bring it to Bern the capital, which is also on the border between the french and german part, as a gift for his Schweizerdeutsch friend.

The game is more in a prototype phase we wanted to find way to express each states feeling
